landing.subtitle: Running multiple AI models in parallel for precision auditing.
landing.liveExample: Live Example • Click to view full analysis
landing.exampleQuestion: What are the key benefits of renewable energy?
landing.howItWorksSubtitle: A simple, powerful process to get the best answer from multiple AI minds
landing.step1Description: Submit any question or upload a document for analysis
landing.step2Description: Multiple AI models analyse your question in parallel
landing.step3Description: An expert model compares all responses for accuracy
landing.step4Description: Receive a unified answer with confidence score
landing.whyConsensusText: Single AI models can be wrong. Multiple models reaching consensus are far more reliable.
landing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Consensus
landing.faq1Answer: By default, your council includes GPT-4o (The Chairman), Claude 3.5 Sonnet (The Critic), Qwen 2.5 Coder (The Architect), Grok 2 (The Reporter), and Llama 3.3 (The Speedster). You can customise this lineup by selecting from 330+ models including Gemini, Mistral, DeepSeek, and more.
landing.faq2Answer: Our multi-model consensus approach achieves 99% average confidence scores. By running multiple AI systems in parallel and having an auditor review their responses, we eliminate single-model hallucinations and biases. The synthesis only presents findings where models agree, ensuring high reliability.
landing.faq3Answer: Yes! Navigate to Settings → Council to customise all five council slots. Choose from 330+ models based on your needs—whether you prioritise speed, creativity, coding ability, or cost efficiency. You can even swap models mid-conversation.
landing.faq4Question: What's the difference between Free and Pro plans?
landing.faq4Answer: Free Observer accounts get 3 audits per month to try the system. Pro Professional (£25/mo) unlocks 200 audits and 50 file uploads monthly. Max Power User (£85/mo) includes 800 audits, unlimited files, and 2M token context windows for large document analysis.
landing.faq5Question: Can I upload documents for analysis?
landing.faq5Answer: Absolutely. Upload PDFs, images, or documents directly in the chat interface. The Librarian (Gemini) will analyse your file and create context that persists across the entire conversation. All council members will reference this context when answering your questions.
landing.faq6Answer: Most audits complete in under 2 seconds. Because all models run in parallel rather than sequentially, you get the benefit of multiple AI perspectives without the wait. Response times vary based on which models you've selected—faster models like Llama deliver near-instant results.
landing.featuresSubtitle: Powerful features to help you make better decisions with AI
landing.feature1Description: Run GPT-4o, Claude, Llama and more in parallel. Get synthesised insights from multiple AI perspectives.
landing.feature2Description: Every response includes a confidence score, showing you how aligned the AI models are on the answer.
landing.feature3Description: Choose which AI models to include in your council. Tailor the consensus to your specific needs.
landing.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of users leveraging multi-model AI consensus for better decisions.
landing.testimonial1Quote: Consensus transformed our risk assessment process. The multi-model approach provides the reliability we need for regulatory compliance in financial services.
landing.testimonial2Quote: For consulting work, accuracy is paramount. Having multiple AI models reach consensus before presenting to clients has elevated our advisory quality significantly.
landing.testimonial3Quote: We use Consensus for legal document review and contract analysis. The confidence scores help our solicitors prioritise which clauses require human verification.
landing.useCase1Description: Investment banks use Consensus for risk analysis and regulatory compliance documentation
landing.useCase2Description: Professional services firms leverage multi-model consensus for contract review and advisory reports
landing.useCase3Description: London fintech startups validate AI-generated financial models and compliance checks

pricing.title: The Council Awaits

pricing.pricingExample: Example: A fintech startup running 170 audits/month would pay £25/mo + VAT
